formattedAddress: 904 Lexington Ave, New York, NY 10065, USA

editorialSummary.text: Seattle-based coffeehouse chain known for its signature roasts, light bites and WiFi availability.

originalText.text:
Usually a very welcoming attentive group of staff behind the counter NOT today. No ‚Äúgood morning‚Äù when anyone walked in and I was standing at the register to place an order, with one customer behind, and we looked at each other and we were like what‚Äôs going on. In an effort to get service I called out asking for who the manager is.

It took about THREE shoutouts for one of the TWO managers on duty to respond. I asked what‚Äôs going on‚Ä¶no welcome acknowledgement upon entering, no acknowledgement standing at the counter and having to call out for a manager, when one of the two staff persons standing with her back to us clearly saw us waiting, to place orders.

I come into this location 1-2 times a week and know what the protocol is. Silence from staff upon entering is not it.

It appears that everyone got the message as all staff are going overboard with saying good morning. I guess they got the message. ü§∑üèª‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è

originalText.text: I ordered a couple of things to eat and drink (so it was a big order) and the girl working there, probably manager, told the guy to not give more than 2 tissues. The gesture put me off completely. Either Starbucks is struggling or the staff (management) is petty and unkind to the other staff. Whatever is was very off putting.

originalText.text: Such a nice and clean Starbucks! A special shoutout to Ryan who is ALWAYS so kind, accommodating and pleasant. Thank you Ryan!!! Their entire staff is so welcoming and warm!

originalText.text: i don‚Äôt like this starbucks location, it‚Äôs convenient for hunter college students like myself, but the employees DO NOT make the drinks well, i get it that they‚Äôre rushing, but atleast make the drink well, first or all the drinks are so expensive now, & then they don‚Äôt even make it right!! like i don‚Äôt wanna pay $7 for a GRANDE!! & it‚Äôs not even tasty! i asked for a simple cold brew with almond milk w caramel & sf vanilla. they barely put any milk & it was so dark & bitter. I asked one of the employees for more almond milk, she opened a new pack of milk & literally poured 2 drops of some clear ‚Äúmilk‚Äù she didn‚Äôt even shake the milk before putting it in my drink, my drink still tasted horrible. I‚Äôm never ordering at this location again
